title: Little Gem and salmon rice salad

ingredients.item: 1 (from a pack of 4) essential Waitrose Wild Alaskan Pink Salmon Fillet, defrosted
Zest and juice of ½ essential Waitrose Lemon
1 tbsp essential Waitrose Half Fat Mayonnaise
½ x essential Waitrose Little Gem Lettuce

instructions.step: Cook the rice in boiling water for 10–12 minutes, adding the peas for the last 3 minutes. Drain and cool under cold water.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the fillet for 5 minutes, turning occasionally. Cool and break into flakes.
Mix the lemon zest and juice with the mayonnaise and chives then add the rice, peas, salmon and seasoning.
Line a serving bowl with the lettuce leaves and fill with the salmon mixture.
